subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Under the tutelage of Marist Coach Matt Brady, who has a reputation as a technician of the jump shot, guard Jared Jordan is perfecting his mechanics while bolstering his reputation.
snippet: Under the tutelage of Marist Coach Matt Brady, who has a reputation as a technician of the jump shot, guard Jared Jordan is perfecting his mechanics while bolstering his reputation.
